Kecuali Pasal Penghinaan Presiden, Pemerintah Bahas Ulang RKUHP
04 Nov 2019, 13:53 by Budiarti Utami Putri, Syailendra Persada
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Menteri Hukum dan HAM Yasonna H. Laoly mengatakan akan mengevaluasi pasal-pasal kontrovesial dalam revisi Kitab Undang-undang Hukum Pidana (RKUHP). Yasonna menyebut ada peluang menghapus atau mengubah sejumlah ketentuan dalam revisi itu.
"Hanya yang kritis itu aja, yang kritis saja kami bahas kembali," kata Yasonna di Kompleks Parlemen, Senayan, Jakarta, Senin, 4 November 2019.
Yasonna mencontohkan yang akan dievaluasi adalah pasal kumpul kebo atau kohabitasi. Ketentuan sebelumnya menyebut kepala desa bisa menjadi pelapor dengan izin orang tua. Yasonna berujar, ketentuan itu akan dievaluasi agar pelapor dibatasi pada orang tua saja.
"Pasal kohabitasi, perlu dari kepala desa, walaupun kepala desa itu mesti izin orang tua, ya sudah buangkan saja. Orang tua aja supaya jangan jadi alat bancakan nanti," kata dia.
Namun ada beberapa pasal tak akan dievaluasi. Menurut Yasonna, pasal-pasal itu di antaranya pasal unggas masuk ke halaman tetangga, pasal aborsi, dan pasal penggelandangan yang sempat ramai dianggap akan menyasar perempuan yang pulang malam. Yasonna menyebut ada sejumlah pasal lainnya, tetapi dia tak merinci lebih lanjut.
"Satu soal unggas itu udahlah, forget it. Perempuan keluar malam itu forget it, apa coba? Iya kan. Justru yang lebih baik kami atur. Bergelandangan dulu hukuman badan, sekarang hukuman denda, tapi kalau enggak mau bayar ya sudah suruh lah dia sekolah, kerja sosial, lebih baik," kata dia.
Ihwal penghinaan presiden, Yasonna mengatakan pasal itu akan tetap diberlakukan. Adapun pasal aborsi juga akan tetap diberlakukan dengan mengadopsi seluruhnya ketentuan yang ada di Undang-undang Kesehatan.
RKUHP sebelumnya telah disepakati dalam rapat pengambilan tingkat I oleh pemerintah dan DPR. Namun pengesahan aturan itu ditunda atas permintaan Presiden Joko Widodo lantaran adanya sejumlah pasal kontroversial.
Yasonna belum menjelaskan kapan pembahasan RKUHP ini akan dilanjutkan. Menurut dia, pemerintah dan DPR nantinya akan membahas skala prioritas RUU yang di-carry over dari DPR periode 2014-2019.
Politikus Partai Demokrasi Indonesia Perjuangan ini pun meminta masyarakat tak berburuk sangka terhadap RKUHP. Dia juga menyinggung ihwal biaya yang sudah dihabiskan pemerintah untuk membahas perubahan kitab undang-undang peninggalan kolonial Belanda itu.
"Kalau dihitung biaya yang dikeluarkan negara ke situ bukan sepuluh dua puluh miliar, mungkin Rp 70 miliar, dihitung dari investasi negara untuk menyelesaikan itu. Masa kita buang begitu saja hanya gara-gara beberapa pasal yang orang tidak mengerti, tidak paham, atau mungkin perlu penyempurnaan," ucapnya.

Except for the Humiliation Article of the President, the Government Discuss the RKUHP
04 Nov 2019, 13:53 by Budiarti Utami Putri, Syailendra Persada
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Minister of Law and Human Rights Yasonna H. Laoly said that he would evaluate the controversial articles in the revision of the Criminal Code (RKUHP). Yasonna said there was an opportunity to delete or change a number of provisions in the revision.
"Only the critical ones, the critical ones, we discuss again," said Yasonna at the Parliament Complex, Senayan, Jakarta, Monday, November 4, 2019.
Yasonna pointed out that what will be evaluated is the article on cohabitation or cohabitation. The previous provision stated that the village head could become a reporter with parental consent. Yasonna said, the provision would be evaluated so that the reporter was limited to parents.
"Article cohabitation needs to be from the village head, even though the village head needs parental permission, so just throw it away. Parents should not be used as tools for piracy later," he said.
But there are some articles that will not be evaluated. According to Yasonna, the articles included articles on poultry entering a neighbor's yard, abortion article, and article on homelessness which was once thought to be targeting women who returned home at night. Yasonna mentioned a number of other articles, but he did not elaborate further.
"One thing about poultry is already, forget it. The woman went out that night forget it, what are you trying? Right. It's better that we set it. Buming first body punishment, now a fine sentence, but if you don't want to pay, then tell her to go to school "Social work is better," he said.
Regarding the president's contempt, Yasonna said the article would still be enforced. The abortion article will also continue to be enforced by adopting all the provisions in the Health Act.
The RKUHP had previously been agreed at the first level taking meeting by the government and the DPR. But the ratification of the regulation was postponed at the request of President Joko Widodo due to a number of controversial articles.
Yasonna has not explained when the discussion on the RKUHP will continue. According to him, the government and the House of Representatives will discuss the priority scale of the bill carried over from the Parliament for the 2014-2019 period.
The politician from the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle also asked the public not to prejudice the RKUHP. He also mentioned the cost of the government that had been spent to discuss changes to the Dutch colonial legislation.
"If it is calculated that the costs incurred by the state there are not ten twenty billion, maybe Rp. 70 billion, calculated from the state investment to solve it. The period we just throw away because of several articles that people do not understand, do not understand, or may need improvement, "he said.
